right_top.text: {{exif.FocalLengthIn35mmFormat|replace(' ', '')|default('-')}} f/{{exif.AperatureValue or exif.FNumber|default('-')}} {{exif.ShutterSpeed or exif.ShutterSpeedValue|default('-')}}s ISO{{exif.ISO|default('0')}}

right_bottom.text: {{(exif.DateTimeOriginal or exif.CreateDate or exif.DigitalCreationDate or exif.DateCreated or exif.DateTimeCreated or exif.DigitalCreationDateTime|default('0'))[:16]}}
